label: ProductLabel
comment: A label, such as a garment label or a radio frequency tag, used for identifying a product.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time, or other date time value, for the attachment of this product label.
A unique barcode identifier for this supply chain trade line item.
A brand name, expressed as text, for this experience product.
A code specifying a category for this cross-border regulatory procedure, such as the appendices of the CITES Convention.
The code specifying the layout type of this logistics label.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The identifier of the end of a series of packages within this referenced logistics package.
The identifier of the start of a series of packages within this referenced logistics package.
The code specifying the size of this logistics label.
The code specifying the type of tag for this product label.

objectProperties.comment: A sustainability assertion included on this product label.

referencedBy.comment: A product care label specified for this trade product.
A product label specified for this trade product.
